citations.narrative:
There is unsealed wood in the enclosure corners and areas where paint is missing on walls of the guinea pig
enclosures. Primary enclosures including their racks, shelving, and other accessories must be constucted of smooth
materials which are impervious to liquids and moisture. The bare wood on the guniea pig enclosures must be
sealed or covered with a surface which is impervious so that the surfaces can be readliy cleaned and sanitized.
Licensee shall ensure that all surfaces in contact wiht the guinea pigs are impervious to moisture.
Correct by June 6, 2015
An exit briefing was conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.28(a)(1)
PRIMARY ENCLOSURES. 
There is unsealed wood in the enclosure corners and areas where paint is missing on walls of the guinea pig
enclosures. Primary enclosures including their racks, shelving, and other accessories must be constucted of smooth
materials which are impervious to liquids and moisture. The bare wood on the guniea pig enclosures must be
sealed or covered with a surface which is impervious so that the surfaces can be readliy cleaned and sanitized.
Licensee shall ensure that all surfaces in contact wiht the guinea pigs are impervious to moisture. 
Correct by June 6, 2015
An exit briefing was conducted with the owner.
